snippet: For the first time in the exhibition season, the Mets played against the Miami Marlins’ new shortstop, Jose Reyes.
lead_paragraph: For the first time in the exhibition season, the Mets played against the Miami Marlins’ new shortstop, Jose Reyes.

headline.seo: Mets See Reyes for First Time as a Marlin
headline.main: Mets Get a Glimpse of What They Once Had
headline.print_headline: Mets Get a Glimpse of What They Once Had
